summary: REQ-1 and REQ-2 appear to be implemented for the desktop search-bar badge (Cloudinary logo URL + bg-accent). However, the change set is not fully scoped to only frontend/src/components/Header.tsx as requested, because additional non-requested files were modified.

hallucinated_features.description: Out-of-scope file modifications outside frontend/src/components/Header.tsx (constraint requested all changes be scoped to Header.tsx only).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly constrained changes to the desktop search bar logo badge in Header.tsx, but the diff shows additional modified files.
